detail.text: You can have multiple Savings Plans active at the same time, and your AWS bill is generated by taking this into account. Conclusion Compute Savings Plans are easy to use, and the Cost Explorer can help you find the right Savings Plan for your usage. By expanding Savings Plans to include AWS Lambda, customers can now choose from a broader range of compute options, and move workloads to Lambda while taking advantage of the discounts available. Savings Plans are available in all AWS Regions outside of China. For more information, read more about Compute Savings Plans <<LINK TBD>>.
